house_listing.house_description: Pretty home in great location. Only 50 +/-' from public park the biggest lot in the area,plenty of room to play football with kids or garden to your heart's content. Note fantastic *assumable 6.5% va loan. $960000 bal appx 9800 dn to assume 29 yrs remaining. Save big $$$ compared 2 high present rates
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
